pages.text: Only affects spells involved with movement and exploration. Affected spells cooldown is decreased 90% and range of effect is increased 25%. Casting an affected spell has a 25% chance of granting the caster Speed and Jump Boost. Affects:$(li)Path of the Sojourn$()

pages.mod_text: You and your scepter are united in your dream to explore the world. Manifests on the Sojourn if you complete the Travelers Path of the Sojourn
